metadata.synopsis: Reflection on the Selunite Ritual scroll found in the Owlbear cave
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Loot the prayer sheet near the statue in the Owlbear cave2. Read it near the chest3. Open the chest4. Loot the ritual scroll5. Read it

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Hmm. Selûnite coming-of-age rituals. Seems like a serious undertaking - dangerous, even.
